tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE TeamRoster (
  team_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  team_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  team_captain VARCHAR(50),
  member_count INT,
  substitution VARBINARY
)

CREATE TABLE players (
    player_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,
    player_name TEXT,
    player_position TEXT,
    player_jersey_number INTEGER,
    team_id INTEGER,
    FOREIGN KEY (team_id) REFERENCES teams(team_id)
);

CREATE TABLE substitutions(
  substitution_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  team_id INT,
  member_id INT,
  substitute_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (team_id) REFERENCES teams(team_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (member_id) REFERENCES team_members(member_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (substitute_id) REFERENCES team_members(member_id)
);

CREATE TABLE TeamMember (
    member_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    member_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    team_id INT NOT NULL,
    role VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (team_id) REFERENCES Team(team_id) ON DELETE CASCADE
);

CREATE TABLE Substitution (
    substitution_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    team_id INT NOT NULL,
    member_id INT NOT NULL,
    role_id INT NOT NULL,
    substitute_member_id INT NOT NULL,
    substitution_date DATE NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (team_id) REFERENCES Team(team_id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    FOREIGN KEY (member_id) REFERENCES TeamMember(member_id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    FOREIGN KEY (role_id) REFERENCES Role(role_id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    FOREIGN KEY (substitute_member_id) REFERENCES TeamMember(member_id) ON DELETE CASCADE
);
